definition: to tie/to bind/classifier for flowers, banknotes etc: bundle/Taiwan pr. [zha2]
to set up camp/Taiwan pr. [an1 ying2 zha2 zhai4]

sentences.english: The construction crew set camp at the specified place.
sentences.chinese: 建築隊在指定地點安營紮寨。

sentences.english: They camped in the woods among the trees.
sentences.chinese: 他們在樹林中安營紮寨。

sentences.english: A core group of about two hundred people remain camped throughout the week.
sentences.chinese: 一個有大約200人的核心團體整週保持紮寨。

sentences.english: The soldiers are encamped on the edge of the forest.
sentences.chinese: 戰士們在森林邊安營紮寨。

sentences.english: The udder cell's genes took up residence in the egg and directed it to grow and develop.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺細胞的基因在該卵子中安營紮寨，令其生長髮育。

sentences.english: Queues of buyers who got all-weather pitched a tent here.
sentences.chinese: 排隊等候放號的買房者在這裏全天候安營紮寨。

sentences.english: They set up camp without saying much, picketed the horses in the meadow.
sentences.chinese: 他們默不做聲地安營紮寨，然後把馬牽到坡上去喫草。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, anti-dissolution tent camps have sprung up in Kiev.
sentences.chinese: 同時，反對解散令的人們在基輔迅速的安營紮寨。
